pullRequest.title: Service configuration validation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Related to #570 . Add validator in the Plain Java enabler for the mandatory and non-mandatory parameters of a service configuration.
Validation provided:

Check if a property is missing or if its value is not present
Check, in case of wildcard, if the system property was set
